function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Gig workers continue to work despite COVID-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 to customers, coworkers, and the general public","Mitigation":"Provide financial support for gig workers to enable them to take time off when experiencing COVID-19 symptoms","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Gig workers, customers, coworkers, general public","Owner":"Government, gig economy platforms"},{"Description":"Inequalities in employment standards for gig workers exacerbate existing disparities","Impact":"Inequitable treatment of gig workers, leading to financial insecurity and health risks","Mitigation":"Implement minimum employment standards for gig workers, regardless of their classification as independent contractors","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Gig workers, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers, government"},{"Description":"Fragmentation of employment services and vocational training creates challenges for displaced workers","Impact":"Difficulty in retraining and finding suitable employment for displaced workers","Mitigation":"Government-led overhaul of employment services and vocational training policies to improve coordination and quality of training","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Displaced workers, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers, government"}]}
